author: R. Prasad
title: Why hospitals are hotbeds of coronavirus transmission
description: Once in contact with the virus on objects and surfaces, there is high risk of infection
content: Across the world, hospitals have become hotspots for novel coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) infection. And hundreds of healthcare workers have been infected in many countries, and some have died too. While the availability and quality of personal protective equipment… [+4441 chars]
